fullText:
Feywild Protection

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, Eladrin, fey step racial power
Benefit: When you use the fey step power, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.


Revision (7/28/2008)
Replace word "your" with "the" before "fey step". Remove "your" before "defenses". All changes to Benefits sentence

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 203.
name: Feywild Protection
prerequisite: 11th level, Eladrin, fey step racial power
benefit: When you use the fey step power, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
